mainText:
This is sad sad day!  I never thought I'll feel like that, but it's overwhelming... tears falling down from my eyes... 
Steve you were great man and you'll always be in my mind, I will tell my son about you and want him to be like you!
My house is full with Apple stuff only because of excellence of those products and I believe that's because literally you were behind all of that to the last screw! Apple will go on!
Miss you a Lot!
Rest in peace, Steve!
author: Girts
